advancedhud.api

Class HUDRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • advancedhud.api.HUDRegistry

  • public class HUDRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Register your HUD elements with this.

    You can register them at init, postinit, world load, really where ever you feel the need to.

    Author:
    maxpowa
